All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlaCarteMenu
    This class prints the Ala Carte Menu and handles processes that involves Items of the Ala Carte Menu.
    CSVAppendable
    Interface for appending lines to end of CSV
    CSVLocatable
    CSVLocatable interface that allows insertion of data into a CSV at a specific location
    Customer
    Customer class that contains Customer information such as name, id, pax, and membership.
    DailySaleReport
    DailySaleReport class that stores one day's worth of orders
    GenericMenu
    Abstract class for subclasses that handles operation relating to different types of Menu Items.
    Item
    Class to store Menu Items' and Sets' attributes.
    MenuCSVHandler
    MenuCSVHandler class that implements CSVLocatable interface and handles inserting and removing lines at specified locations in the CSV
    MenuItemCategoryTypes
    Final class to store Strings arrays of different Item Categories, that stores Item Types under it.
    MenuManager
    MenuManager class to implement methods needed for the menu interface
    MenuUI
    Interface where user can decide what to do with the menu and its items
    Order
    Order class that contains all ordered items for a specific Customer, Table and timeslot Also includes date of order creation and handler staff name
    OrderManager
    OrderManager class that handles all Order related activities, including order creating, editing and viewing
    OrderUI
    OrderUI that links user to OrderManager
    PromoMenu
    Subclass of GenericMenu, that specifically handles operation relating to Menu Items under the Set category
    Refresh
    Refresh thread that runs separately from main app, periodically fetching system time
    ReservationManager
    ReservationManager class that handles all reservation related actions such as creating, removing and viewing reservations
    ReservationUI
    ReservationUI class that links user and ReservationManager
    Restaurant
    Restaurant class that stores all reservation information at all timeslots and tables
    RestaurantInterface
    RestaurantInterface boundary class that is the main convenor between user and the app
    SaleReports
    SaleReports class that contains collection of DailySaleReport objects and their respective dates.
    SalesCSVHandler
    SalesCSVHandler class that implements CSVAppendable interface and handles updating the overall sales data with sales data per day
    SalesManager
    SalesManager class that handles all sales related activities, including storing and fetching sales data
    SalesUI
    SalesUI class that links user to the SaleReports
    Table
    Table class that contains table information such as table number, max seating capacity of the table, timeslots, and customers reserving this table at each timeslot
